mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUB, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

WITH ORDEREDBOARD AS( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.MEM_ID, B.BOARD_SUB, B.BOARD_TITLE, SUBSTR(B.BOARD_CONTENT,1,30) BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_DATE, B.BOARD_HITS, NVL((SELECT COUNT(D.LIKE_TYPE) LIKE_TYPE FROM LIKE_BOARD D WHERE D.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO GROUP BY D.BOARD_NO),0) LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD B
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) SELECT A.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ORDEREDBOARD.* , count(1) over() as totalCnt FROM ORDEREDBOARD ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_HITS DESC) RNUM, BOARD_NO, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUB , BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_DEL_DATE, LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD ) A WHERE A.RNUM <= 10
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent,jdbcType=CLOB}, LIKE_CNT = #{likeCnt}, BOARD_SUB = #{boardSub,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: WITH T AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_HITS DESC) RNUM , BOARD_NO, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUB, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_DEL_DATE, LIKE_CNT FROM BOARD ) SELECT * FROM T WHERE T.RNUM <= 5
